Sentencas: La1-xSrxMnO3+delta oxides with 0 less than or equal to x less than or equal to 0.6 were synthesized via sol-gel route (Pechini process).
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ (0≤x≤0.6) powder by sol-gel processing

Sentencas: The gel decomposition as studied by several thermal analysis methods.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ (0≤x≤0.6) powder by sol-gel processing

Sentencas: After calcination at 1000 degreesC of the dried gels, the oxides were characterized by X-ray diffraction, thermal analyses, transmission and scanning electron microscopies and chemical analyses.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ (0≤x≤0.6) powder by sol-gel processing

Sentencas: In order to correlate the Mn4+/Mn3+ ratio with the symmetry of the structure and the particle size, the nonstoichiometry level at room temperature, delta, was determined by two methods: chemical titration and temperature programmed reduction.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ (0≤x≤0.6) powder by sol-gel processing

Sentencas: It is shown that a negative correlation exists between the strontium content and the nonstoichiometry level.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ (0≤x≤0.6) powder by sol-gel processing

Sentencas: i.e., at low Sr content the oxygen content is higher.
Titulo: Preparation and characterization of La1-xSrxMnO3+δ (0≤x≤0.6) powder by sol-gel processing
